restaurants.name: Golbarir Kosha Mangsho
restaurants.address: Shyambazar, 211, Acharya Prafulla Chandra Rd, Fariapukur, Kolkata, West Bengal 700004

reviews.name: Nellohit
reviews.comments: Delicious foods . Mutton is awesome with the quality. Price is perfect. I love this place. But sitting arrangements quite bad. Except this, rest of the things perfect. Please go there and have some fun, but take your time to go there, since sitting arrangements is short.

reviews.name: Pritam
reviews.comments: কষা মাংস the quality they offer is justifying enough against their branding. May be the best (only if you can ignore health issues) mutton you can have here or around.

reviews.name: Radhika
reviews.comments: Although I personally feel that Golbari used to serve better tasting food in the past,  however I think that the quality of food here is still fairly good.  Seating crunches is not a fault of the restaurant,  as they don't have any space for expansion.  Plus, they very rightly want to maintain their tradition. Prices are not very high, unless you start comparing with roadside eateries. Service is also quite decent.

restaurants.name: Aminia
restaurants.address: 6a, SN Banerjee Road, New Market Area, Dharmatala, Taltala, Kolkata, West Bengal 700087

reviews.name: Avinabh
reviews.comments: Great family restaurant with lots of non veg variety. It's really very old restaurant. The waiters are very well behaved and they help you to choose the correct dish, if you are confused. I always find this place good for family n friends gathering.

reviews.name: Anirban Das
reviews.comments: Pretty  good. Expecting better  quality according to price. And behavior  satisfactory.

reviews.name: Samrat
reviews.comments: Good muglai restaurant. Quality of food is excellent. But only one thing I want to say, the quantity of BIRIYANI should be little bit more.

restaurants.name: Barbeque Nation
restaurants.address: 24 Park Center Building, Park St, Park Street area, Kolkata, West Bengal 700016

reviews.name: Rahul
reviews.comments: One of the best restaurants in park Street. The ambiance is excellent, the staff extremely cordial and helpful. The food is amazing the taste is great so is the pocket friendly portions. The place is also centrally located which is easily accessible from the main road. Has a restroom. Overall recommended for Chinese dishes.

reviews.name: Pritha
reviews.comments: If you are up for good Chinese food, this place is perfect! They maintain good quality and quantity of food. Their menu has many varieties in chicken, fish, pork. The ambience is also very nice located centrally in the park street area. One of my personal favourite Chinese restaurant.

reviews.name: Himanshi
reviews.comments: Food is good.. people who serve are very professional and courteous. Overall a good place

restaurants.name: Bhojohori Manna
restaurants.address: 11A, Road, K.C. Das, Beside, Sido Kanhu Dahar, Chowringhee North, Bow Barracks, Kolkata, West Bengal 700069

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: Did not expect this from Bhojohori manna. The place is quite small to start with, next there is a single toilet which once locked from inside cannot be accessed.Coming to food, they had half the menu unavailable during dinner at 8. Even the rice dish was not of proper quality. Authentic Bengali dishes were all unavailable. I am not sure if this is specific to this branch only but my review is based on the same.2 stars only for the staff who tried their level best to help us out.

reviews.name: Ayan
reviews.comments: If I lived in NY and got diabetes from eating here every single time I ate, I would do it over and over and over again just for that first bite. These guys know how to make a sandwich. The heart attack comes free of charge! Came by while I was visiting NYC. First pit-stop when I come back :)!

reviews.name: David
reviews.comments: Very poor service. Food quality is not up to the mark.Prices are too much for the quantity and quality they provide.Very bad ambience in here. Ceiling is too low. (less than 6')

restaurants.name: ITC Sonar
restaurants.address: JBS Haldane Ave, Opp Science City, Tangra, Kolkata, West Bengal 700046

reviews.name: Madhurima Das
reviews.comments: Quality not upto the mark..limited starters and main course food is just ok to taste. Identified flies inside the hall..not satisfied.

reviews.name: Rajib
reviews.comments: a wonderful place with delicious food and extremely helpful staff.

reviews.name: Adan
reviews.comments: Good conference room and nice ambience. Food is always amazing here. Good place for corporate stuffs. Generally less busy place.

restaurants.name: The Oberoi Grand
restaurants.address: 15, Jawaharlal Nehru Road, New Market Area, Dharmatala, Taltala, Kolkata, West Bengal 700013

reviews.name: Syed
reviews.comments: An excellent hotel in Kolkata with very well equipped rooms and facilities. Great location. Enjoyed the 24 hour gym. What stands out most is the exceptional service.  Extermely friendly and helpful staff who are the best I’ve seen anywhere.

reviews.name: Manik
reviews.comments: Overall, a great try of New York BBQ. The restaurant décor is rustic with a good amount of seats to sit and enjoy the meal. I definitely would love to come back and try that monster of a beef rib!

reviews.name: Sudeshna
reviews.comments: The ambience, as always, transports one to the golden yesteryears... It is always lovely to come back to this beautiful hotel at the heart of the city. You can shut out the hustle and bustle of the city the moment you step inside this majestic building.

restaurants.name: Taj Bengal Kolkata
restaurants.address: 34B, Belvedere Road, Alipore, Kolkata, West Bengal 700027

reviews.name: Hrittika
reviews.comments: Excellent hotel near alipur zoo an unique place to stay in. Slightly off the new city but you will feel the heritage and smell of Kolkata. You see the zoo from the rooms. Excellent arrangements and food you can have it here.

reviews.name: Anwesha
reviews.comments: It's a heritage of Kolkata and has reasons for it. The interiors are such grand and well maintained. Courtesy of people are great. In every aspect it is a 5 star property!!

reviews.name: Somnath
reviews.comments: Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice. We travelled with two six year olds and lots of luggage and despite the stairs up to the elevator this was one of the nicest places we stayed in the four weeks.

restaurants.name: Indian Coffee House
restaurants.address: Sharda Book Stall, 15, Near, Bankim Chatterjee St, College Square West, College Square, Kolkata, West Bengal 700073

reviews.name: Rahul
reviews.comments: It takes back to you a time when life was not so fast and hard. A historical place and what a vibe. Coffee and cutlet combination will definitely win your heart. The big painting of Rabindranath Tagore is incredible.

reviews.name: James
reviews.comments: Crowded! You will wait a long time to get a table! But smoking is now limited which is nice. The food is nothing special but the nostalgic atmosphere is great. Spend a few hours here with a friend drinking coffee and chatting.

reviews.name: Ganesh
reviews.comments: One of the finest places in Kolkata. Culturally very important. You don't really go here thinking about food quality or so. Experience one of most important hangout places in the city.

restaurants.name: Peter Cat
restaurants.address: 18 A, Stephen Court, Park Street, Opposite KFC Restaurant, Park Street area, Kolkata, West Bengal 700016

reviews.name: Jack
reviews.comments: Situated in the heart of the park street area the place is ideal for hangout with friends, family and colleagues. They offer good service paired with great ambiance.  food was delicious too. over all good experience.4 Stars.

reviews.name: Ranveer
reviews.comments: Overall, I would definitely recommend this place if you enjoy thick curly noodles with a thick, intense broth.  If you don't there are still other options but I can't vouch for those.

reviews.name: Shally
reviews.comments: One of the city's legendary restaurant. Queue and waiting time can be a major turn off on busy days. Be prepared to queue for more than one hour on popular holidays and festivals.

restaurants.name: Oudh 1590
restaurants.address: 23/B, Deshapriya Park west,near carmel primary school, Manoharpukur, Kalighat, Kolkata, West Bengal 700026

reviews.name: Avantika
reviews.comments: Amazing food. Beautiful ambience. The staff are also very courteous and polite. Good place to go for authentic food. Slightly expensive but worth the money.

reviews.name: Shrejit
reviews.comments: Amazing food, ambience top notch and really friendly and helpful staff. A must try for all the kebab and biryani lovers. The dimmed lights gives an amazing vintage retro feel and seems like one has gone back in time. Hats off.

reviews.name: Joyee
reviews.comments: Food is good.But with day to day their services just are just  becoming poor and poor.You just dont get the royal treatment that was given previously.
